title: Enjoy the exciting city nightlife and the thriving local arts scene
posting_body: Text ID# 5267A to my cell for more info!
For the Austinite Who Wants it All
Look no further: at East, you’ll find everything you want and need in your new home, and so much more.
We offer a large selection of unique studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom apartment homes that combine design and function to create the perfect space to live, work, and play.
Open layouts and sleek finishes give your home a modern and comfortable feel.
Gourmet kitchens include stainless steel appliances and lots of space for storage and culinary adventures.
Enjoy convenient features such as in-unit washers and dryers, Nest thermostats, and electronic keyed entry.
Soaring ceilings, oversized windows, and large private patios provide you with plenty of space to unwind or entertain.
Our community provides an expansive list of amenities, including a resort-style pool, rooftop lounge, fitness center, pet park, and business center.
Resident perks include a parking garage, car charging station, bike storage, and complimentary wi-fi in all common areas.

East 7th Street means close proximity for hassle-free commuting to downtown Austin and the University of Texas, and the neighborhood boasts an assortment of trendy restaurants, pubs, coffee shops, and locally owned boutiques all within walking distance.
Enjoy the exciting city nightlife and the thriving local arts scene, as well as the scenic views at one of the many beautiful neighborhood parks.
At East, our goal is to exceed your expectations.
Our dedicated and professional leasing staff is happy to assist you, and our maintenance team is prompt, courteous, and available 24/7.
Our leasing team is waiting to welcome you home!
Schedule a time to come and take a tour, and experience first-hand everything East has to offer
